name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Anthony ARMSTRONG, Appellee

judges: BEFORE: CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, BALDWIN and FITZGERALD, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Anthony ARMSTRONG, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal is dismissed as improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Hugh J. Burns, Esq., Jonathan Michael Levy, Esq., Philadelphia District Attorney’s Office, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
Joshua Sarner, Esq., Sarner & Associates, P.C., Philadelphia, for Anthony Armstrong.
casebody.head_matter:
937 A.2d 378
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Anthony ARMSTRONG, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 15, 2007.
Dec. 27, 2007.
Hugh J. Burns, Esq., Jonathan Michael Levy, Esq., Philadelphia District Attorney’s Office, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
Joshua Sarner, Esq., Sarner & Associates, P.C., Philadelphia, for Anthony Armstrong.
BEFORE: CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, BALDWIN and FITZGERALD, JJ.
